title: Brain Elixers, Pro Tips, and Adaptogens, Oh My…
description:
Heidi and Dr. Josh Axe are back to co-host with the gang as they discuss how to heal your body with adaptogens, improve your memory, and reboot your thyroid, and Jillian gives her pro tips on how to perform the perfect lunge, press, and squat.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
